title: Wrist shaking (warm-up)
description:
- Sit or stand tall, shoulders relaxed.
- Gently shake wrists as if flicking water off fingers.
- Movement only at wrists; keep arms relaxed.

title: Wrist circles
description:
- Elbows at sides, bent 90°. Hands in front at lower rib level.
- Slowly draw large circles at the wrists.
- Keep fingers relaxed; do not rotate the forearms.

title: Prayer position - wrist stretch
description:
- Palms together in front of chest, elbows out.
- Without separating palms, lower hands toward abdomen until a light stretch.
- Briefly hold in the bottom position (≈3–5 s), then rise back up.

title: Wrist extensor stretch (arm straight)
description:
- Arm straight at shoulder height, elbow extended, palm down.
- With the other hand, gently pull fingers up toward you to flex the wrist.
- Feel stretch along the back of forearm/wrist. Alternate hands each round.

title: Fist flexion/extension (thumb out/in)
description:
- Arm forward or forearm on table.
- Close a fist with thumb outside → open → close with thumb inside → open.
- Moderate effort, smooth control; reduce range if painful.

title: Finger spread (interdigital stretch)
description:
- Hand straight (in air or on table).
- Actively spread fingers as wide as possible → bring back together.
- Move only the fingers; keep the rest of the arm relaxed.

title: Finger lifts on table
description:
- Palm flat on table, fingers straight; wrist stays down.
- Lift one finger at a time as high as possible, then lower.
- After singles, try lifting all fingers together briefly.

title: Side-to-side with raised finger
description:
- From the table position, slightly raise one finger.
- Move it gently left–right like a small pendulum, then switch finger.
- Can be done without table support if easier.

title: Finger-to-thumb ‘O’ taps
description:
- Hand in front of you, wrist neutral.
- Touch thumb to index → middle → ring → little finger, forming an ‘O’ each time.
- Keep other fingers relaxed/extended as possible.

title: Thumb flexion to palm
description:
- Palm up. Abduct thumb away from palm.
- Flex thumb across palm toward base of little finger → return and abduct.
- Pause 1–2 s in the end range if comfortable.

title: Thumb abduction with elastic band
description:
- Place an elastic band around all fingers including thumb near nail folds.
- Abduct (move away) the thumb against resistance, then return with control.
- Keep wrist/hand quiet; move only the thumb.

title: Thumb stretch (passive)
description:
- With other hand, gently stretch thumb: abduction/outward → across-palm.
- Smooth pressure, no pain; feel stretch near thumb base and palm.

title: Hook fist (distal/middle phalanges)
description:
- Hand facing you.
- Flex only middle and end joints, keeping the big knuckles straight → return.
- Move slowly with control; no joint pain.

title: Soft ball squeeze
description:
- Hold a soft stress/therapy ball.
- Squeeze firmly with all fingers and thumb for 1–2 s → release.
- Do 2–3 sets per day if comfortable.

title: Finger extension with rubber band
description:
- Place a sturdy rubber band around the fingertips of all five fingers.
- Spread fingers against the band → return slowly.
- Add a second band if resistance is too light.

title: Towel wringing (alternating twists)
description:
- Hold a rolled towel with both hands.
- Twist hands in opposite directions as if wringing water, then reverse.
- Moderate effort; relax briefly between full twist cycles.

title: Crumple cloth or paper
description:
- Place a piece of cloth or paper on a table.
- Scrunch it into a tight ball using one hand → spread it out and repeat.
- Focus on full grasp and maximal crumple each time.

title: Thumb circles
description:
- Elbows at sides, bent 90°.
- Draw circles with the thumb: clockwise → counterclockwise.
